byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MEGAN TWOHEY

abstract: Hillary Clinton, in first presidential debate, spotlights crude and insulting remarks made by Donald Trump about former Miss Universe Alicia Machado; in series of interviews with The New York Times focusing on Trump's degrading treatment of women, Machado has discussed experience, which took place when she was still teenager, and its long-term negative effects.

headline.print_headline: For Ex-Miss Universe, a New, Harsh Spotlight
headline.main: Shamed and Angry: Alicia Machado, a Miss Universe Mocked by Donald Trump

snippet: During Monday’s debate, Hillary Clinton put a spotlight on Ms. Machado, who was nicknamed “Miss Eating Machine” by Mr. Trump in 1996 and says she has never fully recovered....
lead_paragraph: During Monday’s debate, Hillary Clinton put a spotlight on Ms. Machado, who was nicknamed “Miss Eating Machine” by Mr. Trump in 1996 and says she has never fully recovered.
